mapper.select: SELECT person_item_num, pi.person_num, item_type, item_num, person_item_role, person_name, i.image_url, i.image_oname FROM person_item pi JOIN person p ON pi.person_num = p.person_num JOIN image i ON pi.person_num = i.image_item_num WHERE item_type = 1 AND item_num = #{movie_num} AND i.image_item_type = 3

SELECT p.person_num, p.person_name, p.person_job, p.person_content, i.image_oname FROM person p JOIN image i ON p.person_num = i.image_item_num WHERE i.image_item_type = 3 AND p.person_num = #{person_num}

SELECT m.movie_num, pp.person_item_role,m.movie_name, YEAR(m.movie_open) movie_open, i.image_oname, ifnull(r.review_avg, 0) review_avg FROM person_item pp JOIN movie m ON pp.item_num = m.movie_num AND pp.item_type = 1 JOIN image i ON pp.item_num = i.image_item_num AND i.image_item_type = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT review_item_num, avg(review_score) review_avg FROM review WHERE review_item_type = 1 GROUP BY review_item_num) r ON r.review_item_num = pp.item_num WHERE person_num = #{person_num};

SELECT t.tv_num, pp.person_item_role,t.tv_name, YEAR(t.tv_open) tv_open, i.image_oname, ifnull(r.review_avg, 0) review_avg FROM person_item pp JOIN tv t ON pp.item_num = t.tv_num AND pp.item_type = 2 JOIN image i ON pp.item_num = i.image_item_num AND i.image_item_type = 2 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT review_item_num, avg(review_score) review_avg FROM review where review_item_type = 2 GROUP BY review_item_num) r ON r.review_item_num = pp.item_num WHERE person_num = #{person_num}
